name: A Bit of Love - A Robot Love Story
name_original: A Bit of Love - A Robot Love Story
description:
A game about a little robot trying to save his love from an evil force! Will you aid this bot to save her?

This game includes:

3 Stages
Platforming Fun
xBox One Controller Support (Others might work im not sure)

Made for Weekly Game Jam 123 "Same, But Different"
